name: Outdoor lighting
text:
To the extent that it is practical and not in conflict with any safety regulation or federal law, regulation, or mandate, if any airport rule or standard relating to outdoor lighting on any ramp or apron area, roadway, or parking lot conflicts with any county ordinance or other rule regarding outdoor lighting, the more stringent requirement or standard shall govern all new installations of outdoor lighting. [L 2007, c 121, §2]
 
Note
 
  Starlight reserve; advisory committee (repealed June 30, 2013).  L 2009, c 161; L 2011, c 39.
